alert.note: Alert for Northern Ventura County Mountains; Santa Barbara County Interior Mountains; Santa Ynez Mountains Eastern Range (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 07 at 5:06AM PST until December 08 at 6:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 6 AM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...North winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. Local gusts to 70 mph in the most wind-prone areas such as near Montecito Hills. * WHERE...Santa Ynez Mountains Eastern Range, Santa Barbara County Interior Mountains and Northern Ventura County Mountains. * WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to 6 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds may blow down large objects such as trees and power lines. Power outages are likely. Travel will be difficult, especially for drivers of high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around large trees. If possible, remain indoors and avoid windows. Use extra caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Northern Ventura County Mountains; Santa Barbara County Interior Mountains; Santa Ynez Mountains Eastern Range
